author: BBC News Mundo
title: La caravana migrante denuncia más restricciones tras la reunión de México con EE.UU.
text:
EFE Latam La caravana migrante denuncia más restricciones tras la reunión de México con EE.UU. Leer todo el artículo Agencia EFE 29 de diciembre de 2023, 1:21 a. m. · 3 min de lectura
Tapachula (México), 28 dic (EFE).- La caravana de miles de migrantes, que partió de la frontera sur de México como la más numerosa del año, denunció durante su avance este jueves mayores restricciones migratorias tras la reunión del presidente, Andrés Manuel López Obrador, con funcionarios estadounidenses.
Los migrantes, de una veintena de nacionalidades, caminaron agotados, a paso lento y con heridas en sus pies tras recorrer este día unos 35 kilómetros de Escuintla a Mapastepec, donde cuestionaron el encuentro de López Obrador con los secretarios estadounidenses de Estado, Antony Blinken, y de Seguridad Nacional, Alejandro Mayorkas.
"La migración no es ilegal, sino que últimamente los Gobiernos han estado creando demasiados obstáculos, en el caso de los venezolanos, no les dan pasaporte o la visa para viajar a México en avión", expuso el venezolano Carlos Ruiz Pineda, quien camina en la caravana.
El suramericano, de 38 años, primero migró de Venezuela a Colombia, pero después emprendió su trayecto a México con la expectativa de cruzar a Estados Unidos, aunque se ha topado con violencia en el camino.
"Por todos los países que vamos cruzando hay mafias, pagos de extorsiones, entonces pareciera que todos fueran mancomunados (fueran cómplices) en los Gobiernos”, lamentó.
Mayor control migratorio
El Gobierno mexicano aseveró este jueves que ha "intensificado acciones de control migratorio" al asegurar que en los últimos días ha superado a Estados Unidos en encuentros de migrantes en la frontera común, según un documento exhibido por López Obrador en su conferencia matutina.
"Se llegó a un número de migrantes que no se había visto (en diciembre), creo que 10.000 o 12.000 diarios en la frontera norte, y esto llevó a que se cerraran aduanas y los pasos fronterizos del ferrocarril”, reconoció el mandatario.
Luis Rey García Villagrán, el coordinador del Centro de Dignificación Humana (CDH), quien acompaña la caravana, denunció que ambos países han planteado endurecer la política migratoria.
Continuar leyendo la historia La caravana se cansa
Por otro lado, el presidente acusó a los traficantes de personas de estar detrás de la caravana, además de afirmar que los migrantes de este grupo, que partió en Nochebuena con unas 10.000 personas, ya se han reducido a 1.500.
La migrante cubana Yurislady, quien llevaba cinco meses esperando papeles en la frontera sur, señaló que a pesar de que hay cansancio y heridas en los pies seguirán caminando en su travesía en busca de documentos para regular su estancia.
“Solo queremos libertad, en nuestros países no somos libres, por ahora, el objetivo de muchos de la caravana no es llegar a los Estados Unidos, sino quedarse en México para poder trabajar y tener un mejor futuro porque en Chiapas nos tienen presos", indicó a EFE.
Mientras que García Villagrán aseguró que "el presidente de la República que está mal informado".
"Los que caminamos y vamos a seguir caminando somos 7.500 y vamos a seguir siendo más, porque hay gente en Arriaga, Tonalá, Pijijiapan y personas que vienen de Tapachula y para el lunes próximo serán aproximadamente unas 12.000 migrantes que vamos a ir a la Ciudad de México”, refutó.

author: Nick Farrell
title: Global mobile Internet growth slows
text:
However, the growth rate of new mobile internet subscribers is slowing. From 2015 to 2021, over 200 million people per year began using mobile devices to access the internet.
In the last two years, that number has decreased to 160 million annually. Analysis by Rest of World suggests that developing countries are seeing a plateau in mobile internet subscribers, indicating that in countries such as Pakistan, Bangladesh, Nigeria, and Mexico, the most accessible populations to get online are already connected, and expanding further will be challenging.
GSMA gathers data by surveying nationally representative samples in each country and correlates the results with similar studies.
GSMA head of the Mobile for Development Max Cuvellier Giacomelli said that large swaths of the global population still lack access to mobile internet primarily due to affordability issues.
Despite significant drops in data costs in recent years, the International Telecommunication Union, a UN agency focused on information and communications technologies, notes substantial regional disparities.
For example, the cost of data in Africa is more than twice that in the Americas, the second-most expensive region.
“You get this peak of adoption initially because it’s new. The people who can afford it see the value. They knew what the internet was, and suddenly, you got it in your pocket,” he said.
In countries like China, the US, and Singapore, a high proportion of the population is already connected to mobile internet—80 per cent, 81 per cent, and 93 per cent, respectively. Thus, it is no surprise that the rate of new mobile internet subscriptions has slowed.
The rate of new users has also slowed in countries like Bangladesh, Nigeria, and Pakistan, where only 37 per cent, 34 per cent, and 24 per cent of the population currently use mobile internet.
Coverage remains a challenge, although data suggests improvement is happening quickly. Currently, 350 million people worldwide, or four per cent of the global population, live in areas not covered by a mobile broadband network.
GSMA reports that sub-Saharan Africa has the highest coverage gap of any global region. Still, mobile coverage in this area has expanded from 83 per cent to 87 per cent between 2021 and 2023.
Recent advancements in satellite technology may help close this coverage gap by bringing mobile internet to rural or remote areas lacking mobile infrastructure. For instance, SpaceX’s Starlink is now available in over 100 countries and offers a roaming plan.
The data shows relatively steady rates of adoption over time but also highlights how unique products can drive a sudden surge in mobile internet access. For example, in 2016, the Indian telecommunications giant Reliance Jio introduced a welcome package with 4 gigabytes of free daily data for customers.
This led to a nearly 58 per cent increase in mobile internet subscriptions in India between 2015 and 2016. Giacomelli attributes this surge directly to Reliance Jio’s programme. The telecom continued to offer free mobile internet through early 2017, attracting new subscribers.
“The thing you see in India is just this accelerated growth that would otherwise have been flattened over maybe [a period] twice as long,” Giacomelli said. “But once you’ve captured the population who can afford it, then suddenly you start getting slow growth again.”
Despite the late 2010s surge, India’s growth rate for mobile internet subscribers has slowed in recent years. As of October 2024, almost half, or 46 per cent, of the population is still not connected to mobile internet.
Even in countries with high rates of mobile internet subscription, stubborn pockets of people without mobile internet access remain. In China, for example, 80 per cent of the population has access to mobile internet, but subscription rates among the remaining 280 million people are slowing.
Recent advances in satellite technology could bring mobile internet to new users in rural areas. In August, China began launching a satellite internet network set to rival SpaceX’s Starlink to bring everyone online.

author: globo.com
title: Sem Nicolas, Paysandu fica "sem alternativas" para o comando do ataque; entenda | paysandu | ge
text:
Além da derrota do Paysandu por 1 a 0 para o Brusque, pela 17ª rodada da Série B do Brasileiro, um outro fato preocupou os torcedores bicolores - Nicolas, artilheiro do time na temporada com 20 gols (três deles pela Segundona), deixou o campo lesionado logo aos 23 minutos. O que deixa um questionamento no ar: quem seria o substituto imediato dele caso fique de fora contra o Novorizontino.
1 de 2 Nicolas deixou o campo ainda no primeiro tempo de Brusque x Paysandu — Foto: Jorge Luís Totti/Paysandu Nicolas deixou o campo ainda no primeiro tempo de Brusque x Paysandu — Foto: Jorge Luís Totti/Paysandu
Veja mais:
+ Renovação de Esli Garcia com Paysandu esfria, e atacante pode assinar com outro clube
+ Paysandu inicia venda de ingressos para jogo contra o Novorizontino, pela Série B
+ Com derrota para o Brusque, Paysandu perde invencibilidade construída em sete rodadas
Na partida da última quarta-feira, a alternativa encontrada por Hélio dos Anjos foi improvisar o meia Biel, que não atuava desde o último dia 12 de maio . Uma opção que, segundo o treinador, foi treinada e também pensada pelo cenário apresentado no jogo.
- Quem está treinando de centroavante nos últimos 15 dias é o Biel . Eu experimentei outros jogadores por dentro para fazer esse trabalho e ele foi quem reagiu melhor, por isso que eu transferi o treinamento do Biel, fiz uns treinamentos para a partida de hoje em função até que, naquele momento também, nós tínhamos que compor, ter uma flutuação melhor, pois, estávamos com um homem a menos e isso também foi envolvido na nossa substituição - explicou.
Nicolas é o jogador que mais jogou na temporada - 37 vezes nos 40 jogos do clube no ano, todas elas como titular. Em apenas quatro ocasiões ele foi substituído, contando com esta última. Em duas oportunidades ele foi substituído por Ruan Ribeiro, que inclusive vem ficando de fora dos relacionados por conta de uma lesão na coxa. Alias, foi ele o substituto do “Cavani da Curuzu” na única partida que o artilheiro bicolor não jogou nesta Série B, ainda pela 2ª rodada, contra o Botafogo-SP.
O elenco bicolor não conta com opções, pelo menos no papel, para a função de centroavante que é feita por Nicolas. No setor ofensivo, o time tem nomes que atuam pela beirada, casos de Benjamin Borasi, Edinho, Esli Garcia, Jean Dias, Paulinho Boia e o próprio Ruan Ribeiro, que chegou a jogar centralizado, estava atuando pelas pontas.
2 de 2 Ruan Ribeiro foi titular do Paysandu contra o Botafogo-SP, pela 2ª rodada da Série B — Foto: Jorge Luís Totti/Paysandu Ruan Ribeiro foi titular do Paysandu contra o Botafogo-SP, pela 2ª rodada da Série B — Foto: Jorge Luís Totti/Paysandu
Vale lembrar que, no começo deste mês de julho, o clube acertou a saída do atacante Gabriel Santos , opção para o centro do ataque, que atuou em oito partidas na Série B, todas vindo do banco de reservas. Os bicolores buscaram a contratação dos experientes Cassiano e Vagner Love , dupla que acertou com o Avaí. A segunda janela de transferências da Segundona fecha no dia 2 de setembro.
Os bicolores voltam a campo no começo da próxima semana, quando enfrentam o Novorizontino na segunda-feira, dia 29, às 18h30, no Estádio da Curuzu, em Belém, pela 18ª rodada da Série B. O ge acompanha todos os lances em Tempo Real.
*Estagiário, sob supervisão de Nicksson Melo.

author: Jean Laurindo
title: Venezuela anuncia envio de tropas para fronteira com Guiana - NSC Total
text:
O governo da Venezuela anunciou nesta quinta-feira (28) que vai enviar tropas militares para a fronteira com a Guiana, onde fica o território de Essequibo . A região é rica em reservas de petróleo e virou alvo de investidas venezuelanas que resultam em uma disputa diplomática.
Continua depois da publicidade
Receba notícias de Santa Catarina pelo WhatsApp
O anúncio foi feito pelo presidente Nicolás Maduro, transmitido pela TV venezuelana. As informações são do portal g1 . Segundo o site, o presidente informou que 5,6 mil homens estariam prontos para a operação.
O gesto de Maduro é visto como uma resposta ao anúncio de que o Reino Unido vai enviar um navio militar para a costa da Guiana, que faz parte da comunidade de nações que foram colônias britânicas. O navio de patrulha da Marinha Real HMS Trent já estava no Caribe para atuar no combate ao tráfico de drogas, mas será desviada para a costa guianesa.
O governo da Venezuela chegou a afirmar que essa atitude seria uma “provocação”.
Continua depois da publicidade
Os Estados Unidos também são aliados da Guiana e anunciaram sobrevoos militares na região, além de estudar a criação de uma base militar em Essequibo. O governo venezuelano também considerou a atitude norte-americana provocativa.
Em novembro, a Venezuela realizou um referendo sobre a anexação de Essequibo, região maior que a Inglaterra e o estado do Ceará que corresponde à 70% do território da Guiana, mas que a Venezuela alega ser sua historicamente.
Apenas metade dos eleitores compareceu ao referendo, mas o presidente aprovou a anexação, e, na sequência, apresentou novos mapas oficiais já com a região contemplada como de seu país.

author: Advance Local Weather Alerts
title: Winter storm warning issued for Antrim County until early Saturday morning - up to 9 inches of snow
text:
On Friday at 4:14 a.m. EST the National Weather Service issued a winter storm warning in effect until Saturday at 4 a.m. EST for Antrim County.
The weather service adds to anticipate, "Additional snow accumulations between 5 and 9 inches. Locally higher amounts possible. Lesser amounts of 2 to 6 inches across the western half of the county."
"High snowfall rates and gusty winds will lead to rapid drops in visibility, quick accumulation of snow on roads, and hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph," describes the weather service. "If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency."
Staying safe on winter roads: Winter driving tips from the weather service
Winter's icy grip often turns roads treacherous, leading to over 6,000 weather-related vehicle fatalities and more than 480,000 injuries each year. When you find yourself on snowy or freezing rain-slicked roads, your top priority should be safety. Slow down and exercise caution. In temperatures near freezing, it's prudent to assume icy patches on the road and adjust your driving accordingly. Be on alert for ice accumulating on power lines and tree branches, as they may break and fall. If possible, avoid driving in these conditions altogether. But if you must venture out, choose routes with fewer trees and power lines, and never touch a downed power line. If you encounter one, dial 911 immediately. Here are additional winter driving tips from the weather service:
Share your travel plans:
When traveling out of town in hazardous winter weather, inform your family or friends of your destination, planned route, and estimated time of arrival.
Prepare your vehicle:
Ensure your gas tank is full and equip your vehicle with essential winter supplies, including a windshield scraper, jumper cables, a small shovel, flashlight, cell phone, blanket, extra warm clothing, drinking water, and high-calorie non-perishable food.
Stay calm when stranded:
If you become stranded, remain composed. Inform someone about your situation and location. Avoid attempting to walk to safety. Indicate that you need assistance by attaching a cloth to your car's antenna or mirror, and make your vehicle more visible by using the dome light and flashers
Be mindful of snow plows:
Keep an eye out for snow plows and allow them ample room to pass. Only overtake a plow when you have a clear view of the road ahead.
Check road conditions:
Before embarking on your journey, verify the current road conditions to make informed travel decisions.
Stay safe on wintry roads with these valuable winter driving tips from the weather service, and reduce the risk of accidents during challenging weather conditions.
Advance Local Weather Alerts is a service provided by United Robots, which uses machine learning to compile the latest data from the National Weather Service.

author: Beatrice Raso
title: Maltempo Friuli: richieste di ristoro danni per 665 milioni per gli eventi di luglio-agosto
text:
MeteoWeb » METEO » METEO FRIULI-VENEZIA GIULIA Maltempo Friuli: richieste di ristoro danni per 665 milioni per gli eventi di luglio-agosto Il Presidente Fedriga: “stanziati 150 milioni per l’emergenza maltempo di luglio-agosto” in Friuli Venezia Giulia di Beatrice Raso 29 Dic 2023 | 19:37 MeteoWeb A seguito dell’ondata di maltempo registrata a luglio e agosto scorsi in Friuli Venezia Giulia , attraverso l’apposito portale online, “sono state raccolte 29.364 domande di contributo ” per il ristoro dei danni da parte di privati e aziende, per “ un valore di 665,1 milioni” . Lo ha reso noto l’assessore regionale alla Protezione Civile, Riccardo Riccardi, durante un incontro a Trieste, precisando poi che per “ i veicoli sono state finanziate il 68% delle istanze per un valore di 5.225.000 euro, per gli edifici il 91% per 96.408.000 euro, per le imprese non agricole il 99% per 25 milioni, per le imprese agricole il 98% per 16,5 milioni” .
Per quanto riguarda il cronoprogramma per l’erogazione dei contributi, ha aggiunto Riccardi, “ entro il primo trimestre 2024 verrà emessa la comunicazione di concessione del ristoro, in modo progressivo e in base all’istruttoria e alle istanze di regolarizzazione. Per gli edifici per cui sarà previsto un ristoro superiore a 5mila euro, dal primo febbraio al 31 dicembre 2024 sarà possibile richiedere l’anticipazione fino al 50% dell’importo concesso. Le liquidazioni partiranno da marzo 2024 e saranno erogate entro 90 giorni dalla presentazione della richiesta “. Fedriga: “stanziati 150 milioni per l’emergenza maltempo di luglio-agosto”
“ Il Friuli Venezia Giulia è la regione che, a seguito della drammatica ondata di maltempo della scorsa estate, ha investito maggiori risorse per dare una risposta celere ed efficace alla situazione emergenziale. Ancora una volta abbiamo dimostrato di saper reagire con tempestività nel momento del bisogno, con 150 milioni di euro prontamente stanziati. Una risposta importante, resa possibile da una struttura organizzativa altamente efficiente e da una fattiva collaborazione con le amministrazioni locali “, ha affermato il Presidente del Friuli Venezia Giulia, Massimiliano Fedriga.
Il procedimento contributivo approvato dalla giunta, come è stato spiegato, è semplificato dalla possibilità di presentare le richieste di ristoro tramite autocertificazione. “Una scelta – ha osservato Fedriga – che deve essere accompagnata da un forte senso di responsabilità pubblica. Saranno attivati in tal senso gli opportuni controlli. Contiamo su provvedimenti semplificatori anche a livello nazionale: non si possono aspettare le emergenze per velocizzare le procedure” . author: Julian Hull
title: What was the Vatican’s secret deal with China?
text:
What was the Vatican’s secret deal with China?
The Vatican made a secret deal with China in an attempt to ease the longstanding divide between the underground flock loyal to the pope and the state-backed official church in mainland China. This deal, which recognized the pope as the supreme leader of the Catholic Church, was the first of its kind since the 1950s.
What deal did the Vatican make with China?
The Vatican-China deal focused on cooperation over the appointment of bishops, giving the pope the final say in the process. Although only six new bishops have been appointed since the deal was struck, critics argue that it has not produced the desired effects.
Does the Vatican have diplomatic relations with China?
There are no official bilateral relations between the Vatican and the People’s Republic of China. Instead, the Vatican recognizes the Republic of China (Taiwan) as the representative of China, with diplomatic relations established since 1942.
Is it legal to be Catholic in China?
Religious practice, including Catholicism, is legal in China. However, religious activities are subject to tight government supervision and surveillance in the country, which is officially an atheist state.
Why does the Vatican recognize Taiwan?
The Holy See recognizes the Republic of China (Taiwan) as the representative of China based on the One-China policy. This recognition of Taiwan’s sovereignty is in line with the Holy See’s diplomatic stance.
Does Russia recognize Vatican City?
After 1991, the Russian government initiated a dialogue with the Vatican, leading to the establishment of full diplomatic relations between the Holy See and the Russian Federation in December 2009. This diplomatic relationship was formalized through meetings between Pope Benedict XVI and Russian President Dimitry Medvedev.
What is the fastest-growing religion in the United States?
Pentecostalism, a Protestant Christian movement, is considered the fastest-growing religion in the world, with religious conversion playing a significant role in its growth. According to the Pulitzer Center, approximately 35,000 people become Pentecostal or “Born again” every day.
What does the Pope say about China?
In a message directed at the people of China, Pope Francis referred to them as a “noble” people and urged Chinese Catholics to be “good Christians and good citizens.” These remarks were part of the Pope’s ongoing efforts to foster a positive relationship with China and encourage the easing of religious restrictions in the country.
What is China’s main religion?
In 2021, the U.S. government estimated that the religious landscape in China consists of Buddhists (18.2%), Christians (5.1%), Muslims (1.8%), followers of folk religions (21.9%), and atheists or unaffiliated individuals (52.2%). Other religious groups such as Hindus, Jews, and Taoists make up less than 1% of the population.
What country protects the Vatican?
The Vatican is protected by the Swiss Guards, a corps of Swiss soldiers responsible for the security and safety of the Pope. Often referred to as “the world’s smallest army,” the Swiss Guards serve as personal escorts to the Pope and as watchmen for Vatican City and the pontifical villa of Castel Gandolfo.
What countries are not recognized by the Vatican?
The Vatican does not have diplomatic relations with certain countries, including Afghanistan, Bhutan, North Korea, Saudi Arabia, and Tuvalu. These nations do not have apostolic delegations or formal diplomatic ties with the Holy See.
Who controls Vatican Finances?
Vatican finances are overseen by various entities. The Secretariat for the Economy, headed by a cardinal, is responsible for financial matters. Additionally, the Council for the Economy, consisting of cardinals and lay experts, provides supervision and guidance in financial operations.
Where did the Vatican get all its wealth?
The economy of Vatican City is primarily supported by the sale of stamps, coins, medals, and tourist mementos, as well as fees from museum admissions and publication sales. These revenue sources contribute to the financial resources of Vatican City, which employed 4,822 people in 2016.
Does the US give money to the Vatican?
The United States is a significant donor to Peter’s Pence, the fund allocated to the Pope to support his mission. In 2021, Peter’s Pence collected 46.9 million euros, but reported a deficit of 18.4 million euros. The United States’ contributions play a substantial role in supporting the operations of the Holy See.
Did the Pope tell Chinese Catholics to be good citizens?
In an unscripted message, Pope Francis encouraged Chinese Catholics to be “good Christians and good citizens.” This statement was part of the Pope’s ongoing efforts to bridge the gap between the Catholic Church and the Chinese government, which has expressed concerns about the Church’s influence in the country.
Why are Catholics persecuted in China?
The extensive crackdown on Catholics and Protestants in China since 1994 can be attributed to a combination of factors. Economic changes, including widespread unemployment and income inequality, along with the partial withdrawal of the socialist safety net, created destabilizing effects. These challenges, coupled with concerns about social order and control, led to increased religious persecution.
Who brought the Catholic faith to China?
The Catholic faith was introduced to China by missionary priests from the Latin Catholic Church in Europe. The first known arrival was the Italian Franciscan priest John of Montecorvino, who reached Khanbaliq (modern-day Beijing) in 1294.
Which holy book is scientifically proven?
The Quran is believed by some scholars to contain scientific information that aligns with modern science. The Quran’s miraculous nature is often emphasized, with references made to the illiteracy of Prophet Muhammad when considering the book’s composition.
What is the fastest shrinking religion in the world?
Christianity may experience the largest net losses in terms of religious conversion, making it the fastest shrinking religion in some regions. The impact of religious conversion is likely to contribute to this trend.
What percentage of Taiwan wants to join China?
According to a poll by the Taiwanese Public Opinion Foundation, 48.9% of Taiwanese individuals support obtaining formal national independence, while 26.9% prefer maintaining the “status quo,” and 11.8% support unification with China.
Does Taiwan pay taxes to China?
No, Taiwan does not pay taxes to China. Taiwan operates under its own tax system and has its own government. While China claims sovereignty over Taiwan, the region functions as a separate and self-governing entity with its own tax policies and administration.
Can you see China from Taiwan?
China is generally not visible from Taiwan due to the distance between the two regions, which is over 150 kilometers. However, Kinmen, an offshore islet of Taiwan, is located close to Xiamen Island, allowing individuals to see mainland China, which is approximately 2 kilometers away.
Does the Vatican have a secret deal with China?
The Vatican’s secret deal with China aimed to bridge the divide between the underground flock loyal to the pope and the state-backed official church in mainland China. Under this agreement, both sides recognized the pope as the supreme leader of the Catholic Church, marking a significant development since the 1950s.

author: TMZ Staff
title: Drake rinde homenaje a las fans que fueron asesinadas luego de un concierto
text: Drake Rinde homenaje a las fans que fueron asesinadas tras su concierto 2/29/2024 1:59 PM PT Drake está rindiendo homenaje a la madre y la hija que murieron trágicamente después de un reciente show en St. Louis, al mismo tiempo que está haciendo otro gesto dulce con una fanática que está luchando contra el cáncer. Durante su concierto en Buffalo, Nueva York, la noche del miércoles en el KeyBank Center, Drake se tomó el tiempo para compartir un emotivo mensaje con la multitud, a quienes les dijo: "Nunca sabes cómo será la realidad de la otra persona cuando salga de este edificio". También animó a los fans a mostrarle su amor a un total desconocido, lo que hicieron. La mente y el corazón de Drake estaban apenados, ya que se refería claramente a Laticha Bracero y su hija de 21 años de edad, Alyssa Cordova. El rapero añadió: "Que descansen en paz esa joven madre y su hija". El trágico momento fue grabado en video: el dúo madre e hija salían del concierto de Drake y J. Cole en St. Louis la madrugada del 14 de febrero cuando un carro las golpeó a gran velocidad. La policía dice que el hombre que presuntamente conducía el vehículo, Monte Henderson, se saltó varios semáforos en rojo antes de la colisión y acusó al joven de 22 años de dos cargos de homicidio involuntario y dos cargos de acción criminal armada. Pese a esta triste noticia, el primero de los 2 conciertos de Drake en Buffalo no fue del todo sombrío. Un fan se asomó entre la multitud agitando un cartel que decía "Beat stage four cancer just in time for Drake #godsplan". El rapero hizo que la ida al concierto valiera la pena para la mujer. La bendijo con $25k al igual que lo hizo en el video real de "God's Plan". Muy buen momento de Drizzy, en ambos frentes.

author: Tanja Banner
title: Zweite Erde? Hoffnungen um potenziellen Erdzwilling Trappist-1 d werden enttäuscht
text:
Zweite Erde? Hoffnungen um potenziellen Erdzwilling Trappist-1 d werden enttäuscht
Die Suche nach einer zweiten Erde konzentrierte sich auf das Trappist-1-System. Nun zeigen neue Daten des „James Webb“-Teleskops ein unerwartetes Ergebnis.
Montréal – Wenn es um Planeten außerhalb unseres Sonnensystems geht, auf denen es möglicherweise Leben geben könnte, dann fällt immer ein Name: „Trappist-1“. Dabei handelt es sich um einen roten Zwergstern, der nur etwa 40 Lichtjahre von der Erde entfernt ist und von sieben Planeten umkreist wird, die etwa erdgroß sind. Mehrere dieser Planeten befinden sich in der sogenannten „habitablen Zone“ des Sterns – das heißt, auf ihnen herrschen Temperaturen, die flüssiges Wasser an der Oberfläche möglich machen.
Deshalb gilt das „Trappist-1“-System als die größte Hoffnung bei Forschenden, eine „zweite Erde“ im Universum zu finden. Seit das „James Webb“-Weltraumteleskop aktiv ist, kann die Forschungsgemeinschaft die „Trappist-1“-Planeten genauer untersuchen und mehr über sie herausfinden. Dabei steht vor allem eine Frage im Vordergrund: Haben die Planeten in der habitablen Zone Atmosphären?
Suche nach einer zweiten Erde: Der Exoplanet Trappist-1 d ist es wohl nicht
„Letztendlich möchten wir wissen, ob es irgendwo anders etwas Ähnliches wie die Umwelt gibt, die wir auf der Erde genießen, und unter welchen Bedingungen dies möglich ist“, sagt Caroline Piaulet-Ghorayeb (University of Chicago und Université de Montréal in einer Nasa-Mitteilung. „Während das ‚James Webb‘-Weltraumteleskop der Nasa uns erstmals die Möglichkeit gibt, diese Frage bei erdähnlichen Planeten zu untersuchen, können wir Trappist-1 d zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt von der Liste potenzieller Erdzwillinge oder -cousins ausschließen.“ Die Forschungsergebnisse wurden im Fachmagazin The Astrophysical Journal veröffentlicht.
Der Planet Trappist-1 d ist aus der Sicht des Sterns der dritte Planet und befindet sich am Rand der habitablen Zone. Er benötigt nur vier Erdtage, um den Stern einmal zu umrunden. Mithilfe des NIRSpec-Instruments des Weltraumteleskops hat das Forschungsteam nach Molekülen Ausschau gehalten, die in der Erdatmosphäre vorkommen – beispielsweise Wasser, Methan oder Kohlendioxid. Gefunden wurden jedoch keine.
„Webb“-Teleskop entdeckt keine Atmosphäre bei Trappist-1 d
Für das Forschungsteam gibt es verschiedene Gründe, warum um Trappist-1 d keine Atmosphäre entdeckt wurde, wie Piaulet-Ghorayeb erklärt: „Er könnte eine extrem dünne Atmosphäre haben, die schwer zu erkennen ist, ähnlich wie auf dem Mars. Alternativ könnte es sehr dichte Wolken in großer Höhe geben, die unsere Erkennung bestimmter atmosphärischer Signaturen blockieren – eher wie auf der Venus. Oder es könnte sich um einen kargen Felsen ohne jegliche Atmosphäre handeln.“
Allerdings befindet sich Trappist-1 d auch in einem Umfeld, das es schwer macht, eine Atmosphäre dauerhaft zu halten: Rote Zwergsterne sind bekannt dafür, dass sie sehr aktiv sind. Sie schleudern häufig Materie und hochenergetische Strahlung ins Weltall, die die Atmosphäre von kleinen Planeten wegreißen kann – vor allem, wenn die Planeten sich nahe an dem Stern befinden, wie es Trappist-1 d tut. Rote Zwergsterne sind jedoch auch die am häufigsten vorkommenden Sterne in unserer Galaxie, weshalb die Forschung hofft, Planeten zu finden, die im Orbit um einen roten Zwerg ihre Atmosphäre halten können.
Haben die anderen Trappist-1-Planeten vielleicht Atmosphären?
„Wir stehen noch ganz am Anfang, wenn es darum geht, mit ‚Webb‘ nach Atmosphären auf erdähnlichen Planeten zu suchen und die Grenze zwischen Planeten, die eine Atmosphäre halten können, und solchen, die dies nicht können, zu definieren“, betont Co-Autor Björn Benneke. Die Beobachtung der äußeren „Trappist-1“-Planeten mit dem „Webb“-Teleskop läuft derzeit. Wie das Ergebnis aussehen könnte, ist noch unklar. Auf der einen Seite sind die Planeten e, f, g und h weiter vom Stern entfernt – es könnte ihnen also etwas leichter fallen, ihre potenziellen Atmosphären zu halten.
Durch ihre größere Entfernung vom Stern sind sie jedoch auch etwas kühler, was es dem Weltraumteleskop schwerer macht, atmosphärische Signaturen aufzuspüren. „Die Hoffnung für die Atmosphären der Trappist-1-Planeten ist noch nicht verloren“, muntert Piaulet-Ghorayeb auf. „Auch wenn wir auf Planet d keine deutlichen atmosphärischen Signaturen gefunden haben, besteht dennoch die Möglichkeit, dass die äußeren Planeten viel Wasser und andere atmosphärische Komponenten enthalten.“ (tab)
